## 🙋🏿‍♂️ About Me

- 🧰 I’m currently working on empowering others through **[LFX Tools](https://lfx.linuxfoundation.org/)**

- 🌱 I’m currently learning **Agile Analysis & Python**

- 👯 I’m looking to collaborate on **OpenSource Projects**

- 👨🏿‍💻 Excited to start more projects!  **[My Portfolio]()**

- 📫 Any ideas, or challenges? 😎  **henryquaye@hotmail.com**

- 📸 Fun fact **I'm a cinematographer, and it's always Michael Buble time!**
